title: Σώσε με
overview: A lonely woodcarving artist, Nicole Pomanou, returns to her village in Komotini to meet her family at her father's memorial service. The day after her arrival, her younger sister disappears. A few kilometres away, the police officer Despina Loukidis arrives in Komotini to take over the investigation of the murder of a young woman. Her body is discovered in the National Park of Thrace. The victim's eyes have been removed. And this is just the beginning…
